main event: A witness reported seeing a round, opaque object that was very large and traveling slowly in New Cambria, Missouri on November 6, 1957.
interesting points: The object was observed for about 10 minutes and was still in sight when the report was made., The object was described as having no tail, trail, or exhaust and made no sound., The object was heading due south and was not performing any maneuvers., The sighting occurred at a height estimated at 15,000 feet., The object appeared to be moving at 2 to 2.5 RPM.
